channel.title: Tutorial for the v0.6 lowRISC release on lowRISC
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial for the v0.6 lowRISC release on lowRISC

item.title: Release notes
item.description: Release notes Rocket-core (Chisel) Updated to March-2018 vintage together with riscv-tools Rocket repository hierarchy left unmodified for easier updates Compressed instructions and JTAG debugging functional in GDB Clock speed doubled from 25MHz to 50MHz to take advantage of improvements Software environment SD-Card bootloader now uses proper card recognition algorithm SD-cards now run at 10MHz corresponding to Rocket speed boost Ethernet boot loader supports DHCP and is about ten times faster Debian preview release supported with advanced package tool support Linux kernel updated to latest RISCV release lowRISC system-on-chip
